verses.verse: Wisdom <S%H2454><s%> hath <S%H1129>built<s%> her <S%H1004>house,<s%> she hath hewn <S%H2672>out<s%> her <S%H7651>seven<s%> pillars: <S%H5982><s%>
She hath <S%H2873>killed<s%> her <S%H2874>beasts;<s%> she hath <S%H4537>mingled<s%> her <S%H3196>wine;<s%> she hath <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H6186>furnished<s%> her <S%H7979>table.<s%>
She hath sent <S%H7971>forth<s%> her <S%H5291>maidens:<s%> she <S%H7121>crieth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the highest <S%H1610>places<s%> <S%H4791><s%> of the <S%H7176>city,<s%>
Whoso <S%H4310><s%> is <S%H6612>simple,<s%> let him <S%H5493>turn<s%> in <S%H2008>hither:<s%> as for him that <S%H2638>wanteth<s%> <S%H3820>understanding,<s%> she <S%H559>saith<s%> to him,
Come, <S%H1980><s%> <S%H3898>eat<s%> of my <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H3196>wine<s%> which I have <S%H4537>mingled.<s%>
Forsake <S%H5800><s%> the <S%H6612>foolish,<s%> and <S%H2421>live;<s%> and <S%H833>go<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H998>understanding.<s%>

He that <S%H3256>reproveth<s%> a <S%H3887>scorner<s%> <S%H3947>getteth<s%> to himself <S%H7036>shame:<s%> and he that <S%H3198>rebuketh<s%> a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man getteth himself a <S%H3971>blot.<s%>
Reprove <S%H3198><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> a <S%H3887>scorner,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee: <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> a wise <S%H2450>man,<s%> and he will <S%H157>love<s%> thee.

Give <S%H5414><s%> instruction to a <S%H2450>wise<s%> man, and he will be <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2449>wiser:<s%> <S%H3045>teach<s%> a <S%H6662>just<s%> man, and he will <S%H3254>increase<s%> in <S%H3948>learning.<s%>
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom:<s%> and the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H6918>holy<s%> is <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> by me thy <S%H3117>days<s%> shall be <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> and the <S%H8141>years<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life<s%> shall be <S%H3254>increased.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> thou be <S%H2449>wise,<s%> thou shalt be <S%H2449>wise<s%> for thyself: but if thou <S%H3887>scornest,<s%> thou <S%H905>alone<s%> shalt <S%H5375>bear<s%> it.
For she <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of her <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> a <S%H3678>seat<s%> in the high <S%H4791>places<s%> of the <S%H7176>city,<s%>
To <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H5674>passengers<s%> <S%H1870><s%> who go <S%H3474>right<s%> on their ways: <S%H734><s%>
Whoso <S%H4310><s%> is <S%H6612>simple,<s%> let him <S%H5493>turn<s%> in <S%H2008>hither:<s%> and as for him that <S%H2638>wanteth<s%> <S%H3820>understanding,<s%> she <S%H559>saith<s%> to him,
Stolen <S%H1589><s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> are <S%H4985>sweet,<s%> and <S%H3899>bread<s%> eaten in <S%H5643>secret<s%> is <S%H5276>pleasant.<s%>
But he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H7496>dead<s%> are <S%H8033>there;<s%> and that her <S%H7121>guests<s%> are in the <S%H6011>depths<s%> of <S%H7585>hell.<s%>
